issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
I have a system that constantly logs 
{code}
2016-06-13 10:43:01  WARN 000001277 ipt_handler_repopulate   | unknown IPT rule on ingress, will be thrown out: (child process 
4629 executing: //usr/lib/eucalyptus/euca_rootwrap 'iptables-save' -c)
2016-06-13 10:43:01  WARN 000001277 ips_handler_repopulate   | unknown IPS rule on ingress, rule will be thrown out: (child pro
cess 4631 executing: //usr/lib/eucalyptus/euca_rootwrap 'ipset' 'save')
2016-06-13 10:43:01  WARN 000001277 ebt_handler_repopulate   | unknown EBT rule on ingress, will be thrown out: (child process 4635 executing: //usr/lib/eucalyptus/euca_rootwrap 'ebtables' --atomic-file '/tmp/ebt_filter_file-Y94p4Q' -t 'filter' -L)
2016-06-13 10:43:01  WARN 000001277 ebt_handler_repopulate   | unknown EBT rule on ingress, will be thrown out: (child process 4636 executing: //usr/lib/eucalyptus/euca_rootwrap 'ebtables' --atomic-file '/tmp/ebt_nat_file-pCWIES' -t 'nat' -L)
{code}

iptables-save
{code}
[root@c-27 ~]# iptables-save -c
# Generated by iptables-save v1.4.21 on Tue Jun 14 10:30:01 2016
*filter
:INPUT ACCEPT [413935:346231494]
:FORWARD ACCEPT [143938608:134892135377]
:OUTPUT ACCEPT [287469:2101664165]
:EUCA_COUNTERS_IN - [0:0]
:EUCA_COUNTERS_OUT - [0:0]
:EUCA_FILTER_FWD - [0:0]
:EUCA_FILTER_FWD_POSTUSERHOOK - [0:0]
:EUCA_FILTER_FWD_PREUSERHOOK - [0:0]
:EU_f/Z3cgVPCV7Ggc2RpBV21g== - [0:0]
[143938872:134892162305] -A FORWARD -j EUCA_FILTER_FWD_PREUSERHOOK
[143938872:134892162305] -A FORWARD -j EUCA_FILTER_FWD
[143938608:134892135377] -A FORWARD -j EUCA_FILTER_FWD_POSTUSERHOOK
[5917:358985] -A EUCA_COUNTERS_IN -d 10.111.0.0/16
[1835612:1719839124] -A EUCA_COUNTERS_OUT -s 10.111.0.0/16
[143938872:134892162305] -A EUCA_FILTER_FWD -j EUCA_COUNTERS_IN
[143938872:134892162305] -A EUCA_FILTER_FWD -j EUCA_COUNTERS_OUT
[176:19536] -A EUCA_FILTER_FWD -m conntrack --ctstate ESTABLISHED -j ACCEPT
[88:7392] -A EUCA_FILTER_FWD -m set --match-set EU_f/Z3cgVPCV7Ggc2RpBV21g== dst -j EU_f/Z3cgVPCV7Ggc2RpBV21g==
[0:0] -A EUCA_FILTER_FWD -m set --match-set EUCA_ALLPRIVATE dst -j DROP
[88:7392] -A EU_f/Z3cgVPCV7Ggc2RpBV21g== -m set --match-set EU_f/Z3cgVPCV7Ggc2RpBV21g== src -j ACCEPT
[0:0] -A EU_f/Z3cgVPCV7Ggc2RpBV21g== -p tcp -m tcp --dport 22 -j ACCEPT
COMMIT
# Completed on Tue Jun 14 10:30:01 2016
{code}

comments.body: [~tsugawa], I guess this needs to be cleaned up. This is probably invalid redirect in the new set of calls that I've added.
This was fixed a long time ago.
